name: Dorothy Has A Nice Day In Teslic Yard
name_original: Dorothy Has A Nice Day In Teslic Yard
description:
Enter Dorothy, a gelbeast with a can-do horny attitude and nothing to lose! Or would that be everything to lose? Who knows, go play my game about it!!!!!!!!

A VERY SPECIAL THANKS TO MY GOOD AND LOVELY FRIEND, BONNIE, FOR HELPING ME POLISH THE PORTRAIT FACES!!!!!! THANKS, GAL!!!!!! <333

EXTREMELY SPECIAL LAST-MINUTE THANKS TO MY FRIEND OPA!!!!!! WHO HELPED ME HACK IN THE CORRECT COLORS FOR THE GOO PILES AT THE LAST MINUTE!!
